content: **buy any 2 patterns and get 30% off** this pattern has been designed as part of the charity stash bash cal 1 soap is one of the requested items for the shoe box appeal and while sending someone soap as a gift may not seem appealing adding these cute little cosies will make bath time more fun > this pattern is available free on my blog click here for the free version 2 materials aran / worsted cotton in 2 colours around 10g in total 4 5mm hook darning needle size fits an average bar of soap with instructions to adjust size ability beginner 1 https //www lullabylodge com/2020/01/2020-charity-stash-bash-projects-to html 2 https //www lullabylodge com/2020/03/simple-soap-sack-free-crochet-pattern html
